title: Can you compare and contrast natural and applied philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have to first understand the MEANING of the word Philosophy? As the LOVE of SOPHIA, the Root of the Platonic World, Sophia IS Nature. The World Soul contains the Universe within itself like a Pregnant Mother, all forms seen as an emanation of Her Divine Essence. As it is writ in the Wisdom of Solomon, "WHO IS IT THAT APPEARS AS THE DAWN, the Morning Star, fair as the moon, bright as the blazing sun, majestic as the stars in procession?" As Rumi put it, "You too can have a Love Affair with the Universe, but only if you decline to marry the world." The "Philosophy" applied today has gone astray, we well may rightly say, and lost its way?
